bug.author: shravspy
bug.description: When I try to edit newly created OAuth credential and click the pencil icon. I go to Authorized redirect URIs box and update it with link in document with my client id and press return key, I do not see the URI as confirmed item under Authorized redirect URIs. (The URI should no longer be editable.) URI is still in editable phase. Hence I sm not able to redirect to Kubeflow dashboard once my project link is created

/remove-area centraldashboard /area auth <denchmark-link:https://github.com/shravspy>@shravspy</denchmark-link> I'm confused about where all of this happens.
When I try to edit newly created OAuth credential and click the pencil icon. I go to Authorized redirect URIs box and update it with link in document with my client id and press return key, I do not see the URI as confirmed item under Authorized redirect URIs.
This doesn't sound like a Kubeflow UI, so it seems that some context is missing. Could you provide more information/context about what you are trying to do and what is failing?
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.

In the setting up Oauth for Cloud IAP The uri will not go into the "confirmed" as stated in step 7 <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/gke/deploy/oauth-setup/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/gke/deploy/oauth-setup/</denchmark-link>
